text: Blondie Plays Cupid is a 1940 American crime comedy movie directed by Frank R. Strayer and is the seventh movie in the Blondie series. It stars Penny Singleton, Arthur Lake, Irving Bacon, Glenn Ford, Larry Simms, Jonathan Hale, Luana Walters, Spencer Charters and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1940 crime movies Category:1940 comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Frank R. Strayer Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: Blondie Plays Cupid
